resources.string: "No trains are being tracked.\nTap the '+' button to add a new train."
Failed to add train. Please try again.
No stations are being tracked.\nTap the \'+\' button to add a new station.
Amtrak (Default): API used by the official Amtrak Track a Train Map.
Amtraker: Fast, community-run API. Consider using this if the Amtrak API is failing.
Your train number is provided to you by Amtrak in your reservation confirmation.
There may be multiple trains in operation with the same train number, but the Arrivo Schedule will show all of these.
